title: Peptide dendrimers transfecting CRISPR/Cas9 plasmid DNA: optimization and mechanism
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00116H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Susanna Zamolo, Elena Zakharova, Lise Boursinhac, Florian Hollfelder, Tamis Darbre, Jean-Louis Reymond
We optimize a peptide dendrimer transfection reagent to deliver a large CRISPR/Cas9 plasmid DNA into cells, elucidate its delivery mechanism, and demonstrate its gene editing efficiency.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
